api_list.name: group
api_list.description: Calculates groups of similar documents and determines the topic of each.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://text-grouping-and-topic-extraction.p.rapidapi.com/group"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "text-grouping-and-topic-extraction.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
